text: Emad Houache (born September 4, 1994) is a Canadian soccer player. He plays primarily as an attacking midfielder. ==Club career== ===Youth=== Born in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, Houache moved to Ottawa with his family when he was 10 years old. He started playing with the Ottawa Royals and then went on to play for the Ottawa Fury Academy and AS Hull. ===Montreal Impact=== In 2012, he joined the Montreal Impact. On March 15, 2015, it was announced that Houache would play for FC Montreal, a USL affiliate club of the Montreal Impact, in their inaugural season. In June, he made his professional debut for the club in a 2–2 draw with New York Red Bulls II. He was released by the club on July 29. ===Ottawa Fury=== Shortly after being released, Houache joined the Ottawa Fury's Senior Academy. On 6 October 2016, Houache was signed to the first team along with two other Academy players in preparation for the 2015 Soccer Bowl playoffs. He ultimately did not appear for the first team and was reassigned to the Senior Academy at the conclusion of the season. ==References== ==External links== * * USSF Development Academy bio Category:1994 births Category:Association football midfielders Category:Canadian soccer players Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:FC Montreal players Category:Kitsap Pumas players Category:Living people Category:USL Championship players Category:Montreal Impact U23 players Category:Ottawa Fury FC players Category:People from Abu Dhabi Category:USL League Two players Category:Première Ligue de soccer du Québec players Category:Sportspeople from Ottawa Category:Canadian people of Algerian descent
title: Emad Houache
